scripts.db:migrate: docker compose exec api npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:seed: docker compose exec api npm run db:seed
scripts.db:reset: docker compose exec api npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.db:studio: docker compose exec api npx prisma studio
scripts.test: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.test.yml run --rm api npm test
scripts.shell:db: docker compose exec postgres psql -U anatoview
